channel.title: Your lives
channel.description:
Okay, guys. What's going on in your lives right now?
I'm currently in pain in my chest and might go to the hospital because I think I swallowed a rib bone and it either cut something on the way down or is just stuck...
Comment and tell me what's going on in your life :)...

item.title: Your lives
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

Guy’s, you all have good lifes.

wildskiller:

She beat the shit out of us until we got older. She never drank. She spends money on her cigarrette before she goes grocery shopping. She doesn’t give a shit about us, She kicked my sister out at 17, and my brother at 16. EaEac

Yeah but she’s making you strong.

Keep your head high (;!

[quote=“Wet Dreamss, post:39, topic:445412”]ZOMG! I just met Chuck Norris.

The tales of the legend are true![/quote]

Z0MG!!!

[quote=“wildskiller, post:28, topic:445412”]I am begging people for money, because I want to have cash to get a computer, so I can program, so I can make money, so I can have a life unlike my fucking mom who screwed up my fucking life being a whore, making only $300 a month. We can’t afford shit so we eat Roman noodles and popsicles all day while sitting on our asses doing nothing. We have no cable, no sporty things, no board games, nothing. Oh yeah, I plan on going to college too.

Well, that’s my life…

Here is what I try to use to program with
CLICK ME[/quote]

Trust me, you will grow up one day and be like Larry Page or Sergey Brin if you keep you head high(: !

Read full topic

item.title: Your lives
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

wildskiller:

She beat the shit out of us until we got older. She never drank. She spends money on her cigarrette before she goes grocery shopping. She doesn’t give a shit about us, She kicked my sister out at 17, and my brother at 16. EaEac

She made you who you are now, didn’t she? Regardless of her choices, you have to come to an understanding with your own mom as to why she chose that path instead of others. It’s the best rehabilitation for any person who is kin to you and not living their life like they should be.

Read full topic

item.title: Your lives
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“asshole_rule, post:33, topic:445412”][quote author=Lin link=topic=548179.msg4019714#msg4019714 date=1339925648]
I’ve currently got a million things to do and not enough time. I’m working on a Rarity vector, making a Zelda Majora’s Mask LP, possibly picking up my Rarity server and redoing the core, working on a Gameboy Assembler/Disassembler so I can rewrite a lot of the ASM in the Zelda Oracles games and then start a new project, ZOLE 5, trying to get a real-life job, learn a song on guitar for this girl I really like, waiting for the right time to ask if my parents can buy me a used Dell Optiplex 755 (They’re like $100 and support 8GB RAM and a quad core processor) and a x Radeon HD 5xxx for it, exercise and work out a lot, finish a song I’ve been working on and write 2 more, work on my Minecraft world for once, finish MLP:FIM S2, and trying to make my dad have a really great father’s day. I’ve also got quite a bit of other stuff going on outside of all this that’s getting in the way. Thankfully though, it’s summer time and all I have is time to do all of the above.
[/quote]

That just sounds like you have tons of useless projects, just drop a few of them… you’re overwhelming yourself[/quote]There’s only a couple there that aren’t for my entertainment - I want to do all of those but can’t all in one day.

Read full topic

Lin:

I’ve currently got a million things to do and not enough time. I’m working on a Rarity vector, making a Zelda Majora’s Mask LP, possibly picking up my Rarity server and redoing the core, working on a Gameboy Assembler/Disassembler so I can rewrite a lot of the ASM in the Zelda Oracles games and then start a new project, ZOLE 5, trying to get a real-life job, learn a song on guitar for this girl I really like, waiting for the right time to ask if my parents can buy me a used Dell Optiplex 755 (They’re like $100 and support 8GB RAM and a quad core processor) and a x Radeon HD 5xxx for it, exercise and work out a lot, finish a song I’ve been working on and write 2 more, work on my Minecraft world for once, finish MLP:FIM S2, and trying to make my dad have a really great father’s day. I’ve also got quite a bit of other stuff going on outside of all this that’s getting in the way. Thankfully though, it’s summer time and all I have is time to do all of the above.

That just sounds like you have tons of useless projects, just drop a few of them… you’re overwhelming yourself

item.title: Your lives
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

I’ve currently got a million things to do and not enough time. I’m working on a Rarity vector, making a Zelda Majora’s Mask LP, possibly picking up my Rarity server and redoing the core, working on a Gameboy Assembler/Disassembler so I can rewrite a lot of the ASM in the Zelda Oracles games and then start a new project, ZOLE 5, trying to get a real-life job, learn a song on guitar for this girl I really like, waiting for the right time to ask if my parents can buy me a used Dell Optiplex 755 (They’re like $100 and support 8GB RAM and a quad core processor) and a x Radeon HD 5xxx for it, exercise and work out a lot, finish a song I’ve been working on and write 2 more, work on my Minecraft world for once, finish MLP:FIM S2, and trying to make my dad have a really great father’s day. I’ve also got quite a bit of other stuff going on outside of all this that’s getting in the way. Thankfully though, it’s summer time and all I have is time to do all of the above.

item.title: Your lives
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

Going to college orientation tomorrow and tuesday. Checking up on my college. Running about 50~ miles a week and doing 100 push-ups, 100 squats, and 200 sit-ups to work my core to stay in shape for college running. Watching tons of anime afterward and stayin up all night. Playing tons of games and various other oddities. Parents are selling the house for a smaller trailer and putting it in my step-grandma’s land since my sister and I will be moved out by the time it’s put in. Life’s good. Oh, and my girlfriend and I are fighting again.

wildskiller:

words…

Why not try and appreciate what you have? Sounds great that you’re taking initiative for your life but bashing your mom will let you regret it later. She may not have the right choices now but once you get your own life together, its time to owe up your dues to your mother for even getting the money to let you both survive that horrible situation, regardless of how she went about it. She could’ve just given up and killed both you and herself.

Read full topic

item.title: Your lives

item.description:
@wildskiller wrote:

I am begging people for money, because I want to have cash to get a computer, so I can program, so I can make money, so I can have a life unlike my fucking mom who screwed up my fucking life being a whore, making only $300 a month. We can’t afford shit so we eat Roman noodles and popsicles all day while sitting on our asses doing nothing. We have no cable, no sporty things, no board games, nothing. Oh yeah, I plan on going to college too.

Well, that’s my life…

Here is what I try to use to program with
CLICK ME

item.title: Your lives
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:23, topic:445412”]Coming up to my last week of college, currently work 20 hours a week at the local chemist on top of 4 full days at college, also starting a new job as a software developer (ASP.NET and MySQL databases) next week which will be money++.
I have my own car, and a girlfriend whom I see several times a week. Spend most of my nights working out, getting the body ready for summer. Also starting university come September, taking a web technology course. Life is really good

And I’m an internet forum moderator, WHAT MORE COULD YOU WANT[/quote]

Very nice :).

I plan on going to collage, only 13 atm so got a lot of years to go (:, gonna be epic though!

Native^:

i do nothing but facebook, checking and liking statuses, life’s good.

Nice, I’m banned for up to two days from liking photos on facebook :(…

Read full topic

item.title: Your lives
item.dc:creator: @ictbguud ictbguud
item.description:
@ictbguud wrote:

reyx7:

I fell longboarding around 30 mph onto asphalt, had to get an ambulance ride. Turns out I rolled in such a way I protected my spine, however I have a large gash on my arm, and my wrists hurt. I can still type and txt fine, and recently at work I’ve started working another shift, meaning ill be making about 70$ more pr paycheck, bringing me to like 215$ every 2 weeks.

Nice (: and sorry to hear.

Read full topic
